channel.title: Need Help - Probably Needs Quick Assistance
channel.description:
I need assistance on the two following questions.
1) What is wrong with my compiler: My compiler for my source is having an issue. Everytime I try to run it it comes up with the following: [code]The system cannot find the path specified. You have compiled the Server. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
When I go into edit it is the following: [code] @echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe" -d ./Class/ Java/*.java Java/sign/*.java @echo You have compiled the Server. pause[/code]
Second Question 2) I am trying to look for a item list on my [PI] Server but there is none located. How may I find the item list so i can spawn items?

item.title: Need Help - Probably Needs Quick Assistance
item.dc:creator: @p00n99range p00n99range
item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

Can someone teamviewer with me please?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help - Probably Needs Quick Assistance
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“p00n99range, post:11, topic:412807”]Both gave this error: Please someone help me~!~! TEAMVIEWER WITH ME???

javac: file not found: src\server\model\players\Quests\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]
You don’t have any files with the .java extension in that destination.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help - Probably Needs Quick Assistance
item.dc:creator: @john5689 john5689
item.description:
@john5689 wrote:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src\server\model\players\Quests\*.java src\server\model\players\Content\*.java pause

Try this that may work

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help - Probably Needs Quick Assistance

item.title: Need Help - Probably Needs Quick Assistance
item.dc:creator: @Pyrites Pyrites
item.description:
@Pyrites wrote:

Just grab a script from anywhere… like a tutorial or something. Try this? Usually works for me if my compiler isn’t working.

Something like this for you?

@echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help - Probably Needs Quick Assistance

item.title: Need Help - Probably Needs Quick Assistance
item.dc:creator: @john5689 john5689
item.description:
@john5689 wrote:

hmmmm not sure then… Cuse usually you need to just change the version of your JDK and it works… Sorry im clueless now :(. Sorry i can’t help anymore :’(

EDIT:

Try this

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src\server\model\players\Quests\*.java src\server\model\players\Content\*.java pause

It’s the compiler for my server…

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help - Probably Needs Quick Assistance
item.dc:creator: @john5689 john5689
item.description:
@john5689 wrote:

[quote=“p00n99range, post:5, topic:412807”][quote author=john5689 link=topic=514282.msg3733146#msg3733146 date=1314737910]

@echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_24\bin\javac.exe" -d ./Class/ Java/*.java Java/sign/*.java @echo You have compiled the Server. pause
[/quote]

Now it says this:

javac: file not found: Java\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options You have compiled the Server. Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

Yeah that’s correct, Now save it and double click it and it should work
